How we list items

1. METICULOUS INHOUSE AUTHENTICATION PROCESS

Our house luxury consignment experts offer a combined experience of over 8 years in the fashion resale industry enabling them to carefully inspect all items listed online to ensure they are authentic

2. VERIFY AUTHENTICITY USING ENTRUPY AI TOOL

We use Entrugy: The world's first and only on-demand authentication solution for high-value goods as an additional layer of authenticity ventication.

3. THIRD PARTY PROFESSIONAL AUTHENTICATION SERVICES

We use Entrugy: The world's first and only on-demand authentication solution for high-value goods as an additional layer of authenticity ventication.

4. THREE DAY RETURNS, NO QUESTIONS ASKED

For all orders we offer a 3 day return period for items received back in exact condition as shipped. See full return policy here.

Customers with frequent return orders will incur a restocking fee of AED 70 per order. This policy helps cover administrative costs es thoughtful purchases.

About the Seller Shipping Policy Description Payment Policy Description Return Policy Description

Welcome to The Business of Preloved Fashion (BOPF) – your trusted source for authentic, preloved luxury fashion. Founded in Dubai in 2021 by Hadiza Ibekwe, who brings over 10 years of experience in luxury resale, BOPF is committed to making luxury fashion more accessible and sustainable.

Each piece is meticulously handcrafted using the finest, ethically sourced materials. We believe jewelry is a reflection of personal style and a symbol of love to be cherished for generations.

Why Choose Us?

Authenticity Guaranteed: Every item is carefully inspected and authenticated by our experts.

New Treasures Weekly: Our collection is updated weekly with carefully curated preloved pieces from brands like Hermès, Louis Vuitton, Chanel, Gucci, Prada, Dior, and more.

Luxury for Less: Find high-end designer items at a fraction of their original prices.

Quick Shipping: Enjoy fast, reliable shipping with every purchase.

Sustainable Fashion: Join us in promoting a more sustainable fashion future by choosing preloved.

Follow Us

Stay connected for the latest arrivals and exclusive offers by following us on Instagram @thebopf.

Thank you for choosing [Your Jewelry Brand Name]. We look forward to being a part of your special moments and helping you shine.

• We will use DHL courier for safe and fast delivery.

• Import duties, taxes and charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding or buying.

• We accept only online payment method.

• We accept payment by PayPal and Credit / Debit cards entered on eBay only.

• We accept returns only when there is discrepancy in the item what you received against what you bought.

• In case of return you need to ship the product in same condition as you received in original pack with accessories.

FASHION THAT'S GOOD FOR THE EARTH AND
YOUR WALLET

Buy and sell preloved authentic luxury fashion pieces.

We’re an online platform on a mission to empower consignors and buyers to extend the lifecycle of preloved luxury
fashion pieces.

title: Dior Beige Leather Nappy Diaper Bag
shortDescription: Beige Leather Dior Nappy Diaper Bag. Why let motherhood change your fashion sense, show off this beautiful and functional Dior nappy bag for all your baby utilities. Inclusions: Plain pouch. Color: Beige.
